amendment.description: An amendment to reduce funds for the National Foundation on the Arts and the Humanities(NEA) by $32,000,000.

action.text: Amendment (A037) offered by Ms. Brown-Waite, Ginny.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Brown-Waite, Ginny amendment (A037) Failed by recorded vote: 137 - 285 (Roll no. 564).
